title: [K-12] Machine Learning-Based Colorectal Cancer Diagnosis Prediction Modeling Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational statistical concepts, computer literacy, basic programming experience
context.additional_context: Cultivating problem-solving skills for societal issues through medical data analysis.

learning_goals: Build a machine learning model based on medical data to predict colorectal cancer risk.
Understand the operational principles of the Stochastic Gradient Boosting algorithm and apply it to real-world data.
Analyze performance metrics (sensitivity, specificity) of predictive models and write an interpretive report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
